title: Open Source Projects
description:
I had the pleasure of collaborating on a couple of open-source projects, including a Weather App and an E-Commerce App. Working with them has been an enriching experience.

@dhruvabhat24 possesses a remarkable skill set in creating applications and websites. The applications they have worked on showcase an ease of understanding in both the codebase and the overall code workflow. I look forward to future opportunities to work together.
